summary: CI/CD pipeline experiencing build instability and test flakiness. Deployment success rate declining with increasing build times and intermittent test failures in integration suite.

log_snippets.text: Test failed: integration/payment.test.js - PaymentService timeout after 30000ms
Build step 8/12 failed: npm install timeout - retrying (attempt 2/3)
Apply failed: Error creating AWS ECS service: throttling exceeded (retryable)
Quality gate failed: code coverage dropped to 78% (threshold: 80%)

findings.description: Payment integration tests showing frequent timeouts indicating external service dependency issues.
Docker build steps experiencing timeouts and retries, increasing overall build duration.
Infrastructure provisioning hitting AWS rate limits causing deployment failures.
Code coverage regression below quality threshold requiring attention.

recommended_actions.action: Add test retries and circuit breaker for payment service integration tests
Implement Docker layer caching and optimize npm install with package-lock caching
Configure exponential backoff for Terraform AWS API calls and increase timeout
Investigate and add unit tests to restore code coverage above 80%
Set up build pipeline monitoring dashboard for early failure detection
Review and quarantine consistently flaky tests until dependencies are stabilized
Implement parallel test execution to reduce overall test suite runtime
